ygData.subject: Re: Bind Affinity (A couple of questions....)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... stuck ... warriors ... true. My name is Relyn, and I m a 6th level Cleric of Innoruk.  To answer your question, ignorant human, no you are not stuck.  With
ygData.messageBody:
>From: TRAVISL <TRAVIS@...>
>
>Hello everyone. I play a level 4 mage (seemingly the only class on this
>mailing list)
>and I have a few questions about spells and such. Sorry for the
>list, but it's the easiest way to get it across.
>1. Since you can only use Bind Affinity at level 12, are you basically
stuck
>
>in your home town until then? I find this hard to believe, since
warriors
>might not be able to cast it, but some people have said this to be
true.

My name is Relyn, and I'm a 6th level Cleric of Innoruk. To answer your
question, ignorant human, no you are not stuck. With your meager skills
(as with mine) YOU cannot cast Bind on yourself. However, you can have
a 12th level+ caster cast it on you.
